page.title: 09TEESSIDE AIRPORT FLIGHTS
page.content: When you enter the airport to board a flight, the first thing you must do is{check in}to see if your flight is delayed. Your next task is to have your{cases weighed}at one of the 10 points, each for a different location. If your luggage is overweight then you must pay for the excess. Finally you must wait until your{flight is {announced. When your flight is called you must make your way to the security point where your hand luggage is checked for weapons or other dangerous articles such as aerosols, using an{X-ray {machine.}Even after passing through the metal detector, frequent spot checks are made just to be sure. If your flight is an international one you must then have your{passport checked, then you are free to proceed to the plane.
